title.narrative: Irrigation: Value Chain Development Programme Phase II

description.narrative: Overall objective. The overall objective of PRODEFI-II will be to promote increases in incomes and improvements in food security for poor households in the programme area. Development objective. The specific PRODEFI-II objectives are as follows: increase physical productive capital by building the resilience of production systems to climate change; intensify crop and livestock farming to improve nutritional status and, ultimately, structure the milk and rice value chains, inter alia, to promote youth employment and strengthen capacity of the actors.Intensify crop and livestock farming to improve nutritional statusStructure the milk and rice value chains, inter alia, to promote youth employment and strengthen capacity of the actors

name.narrative: Irrigation: Value Chain Development Programme Phase II

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
